web_snippets: The President and Founding Partner of IF Management, Steve Herz believes that anything is possible. Steve was once a portly fellow who could not swim.
Steve Herz is Founder of IF Management, President of the The Montag Group and a talent agent and career advisor. He is the author of the forthcoming book, ...
Steve Herz is a Senior Attorney and International Climate Policy Advisor with the Sierra Club's International Climate and Policy Campaign.
